For 75 years, our employees have been turning ideas into action to build healthier and more sustainable futures for our clients, colleagues and communities and people.

To strengthen our growing business in Thailand, we are looking for talent to join our Talent Solutions business, as Principal, Talent Solutions

Mercer Talent Solutions business: Mercer's Thailand Talent Solutions business helps clients navigate the Future of Work. With the strongest Workforce Products & Insights database the market, we bring Reward and Talent expertise together to improve the way work works \u2013 from organization design, to strategic workforce planning, to identifying future work, skills needed, skill-gaps, action plans for transformation, to performance and total rewards.

PRINCIPAL, TALENT SOLUTIONS

Our Culture: Entrepreneurial, Data-hungry, Curious, Energetic and Ambitious

Skills we really care about: Problem-Solving, Creative Thinking, Collaboration, Adaptability

What can you expect ?

  • Lead sales and client engagement in Talent Management, Job Redesign, Workforce Transformation and/or HR Strategy & Operations
  • Provide thought leadership by developing points-of-view and opinion papers as well as research efforts relevant to those areas
  • Support client engagement and project delivery in other complementary areas, as needed
  • Mentor, coach, engage, nurture and inspire consultants in the team to deliver a high standard of work

We will count on you to

  • Build trust-based, long-term client relationships
  • Lead business development efforts including the generation of leads and engagement with prospects, build a strong and sustainable business development pipeline
  • Lead proposal shaping, solution design fit to client needs and nurture upselling/ cross-selling client opportunities
  • Guide and lead client delivery in the areas of Talent Management, Job Redesign, Workforce Transformation and/or HR Strategy & Operations
  • Develop strategies, including value differentiators, go-to-market plans and channel management plans for Mercer\u2019s solutions in the practice area
  • Lead, direct and guide consulting engagements, provide guidance to project teams to build trusted relationships and deliver client value
  • Manage project scope, finances and stakeholders to time, quality, budget while developing team skills
  • Support team engagement and well-being; build a thriving, high performing team

What You Need To Have

  • 10-15 years\u2019 experience in HR consulting across various domains such as Talent Management, Job Redesign, Workforce Transformation, HR Strategy & Operations
  • Deep expertise in content areas, good client engagement building upskilling plans and project management
  • Led sales and delivery across clients in Thailand
  • P&L experience

What Makes You Stand Out

  • Thrive in problem-solving, shaping solutions, understanding and solving for client needs
  • Drive a positive, constructive, engaging work and high-performance culture by espousing appropriate behaviors and inspiring others in the team to do likewise
  • Take ownership in the career development needs and champion the professional development of consultants in the team
  • Champion change management efforts for strengthening Mercer\u2019s overall business and financial performance
